listitem.para: This parameter specifies whether the winbindd 8 daemon should operate on users without domain component in their username. Users without a domain component are treated as is part of the winbindd server's own domain. While this does not benifit Windows users, it makes SSH, FTP and e-mail function in a way much closer to the way they would in a native unix system.
Example: winbind use default domain = yes
